snippet: Gov. Jan Brewer says she will expand the state’s Medicaid program to cover citizens who earn up to 138 percent of the poverty line.
abstract: Arizona Gov Jan Brewer says she will expand state’s Medicaid program to cover citizens who earn up to 138 percent of the poverty line, response to Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, which she has fought against.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jan Brewer says she will expand the state’s Medicaid program to cover citizens who earn up to 138 percent of the poverty line.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
